synopsis.text: Finally, Kirari Tsukishima, a 14-year-old beauty with an insatiable appetite for food, has found something else to capture her interest. After rescuing a stranded turtle, she meets Seiji, a member of the popular idol group SHIPS, and falls head over heels for him. Despite being warned by Seiji's bandmate Hiroto that they live in different worlds, Kirari is determined to be with Seiji. She decides to enter the entertainment industry and become an idol herself, but quickly learns that it's not all glitz and glamour. With the help of SHIPS and her cat mascot Naa-san, Kirari must overcome challenges and hardships to achieve both her love and her dream. Will she have what it takes to make it in the idol world? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
